caption:
Iron dragons is recruiting for the 2024-25 season! 🐲🛶
Meet tons of like-minded people from our group training sessions and socials!
No previous paddling experience is needed! Whether you have been a competitive athlete or wanted to be more active in uni, this is a great opportunity to pick up a new sport and get gains in the gym. 💪💪
We have both competitive and recreational crews to offer. Our competitive crew is one of the top U24 boats im Canada and race in both national and international races 💦 (We are trying to qualify for worlds club crews 2026 in Hualien, Taiwan the coming year at Nats)

Follow us on Instagram and sign up for our mailing list for weekly emails! ✉ We will be sending out info for our info sessions (free pizza?) and give-it-a-try day plus more events to come. 👀

#irondragons #uoftengineering #uoft #frosh #paddling #fitness #recruitment #dragonboating
